Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.transaction.state.storeview

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EntityIdIterator  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultNodePropertyAccessor  
    DynamicIndexStoreView
    Store view that will try to use label scan store LabelScanStore to produce the view unless label scan store is empty or explicitly told to use store in which cases it will fallback to whole store scan.
    LabelViewNodeStoreScan<FAILURE extends Exception>
    Store scan view that will try to minimize the amount of scanned nodes by using label scan store LabelScanStore as a source of known labeled node ids.
    NeoStoreIndexStoreView
    Node store view that will always visit all nodes during store scan.
    NodeStoreScan<FAILURE extends Exception>
    Scan the node store and produce updates for indexes and/or updates for label index depending on which visitors that are used.
    PropertyAwareEntityStoreScan<CURSOR extends StorageEntityScanCursor,​FAILURE extends Exception>
    Scan store with the view given by iterator created by PropertyAwareEntityStoreScan.getEntityIdIterator().
    RelationshipStoreScan<FAILURE extends Exception>
    Scan the relationship store and produce updates for indexes and/or updates for relationship type index depending on which visitors that are used.
    RelationshipTypeViewRelationshipStoreScan<FAILURE extends Exception>  
    TokenScanViewIdIterator<CURSOR extends StorageEntityScanCursor>
    Entity id iterator used during index population when we go over entity ids indexed in a token scan store.
